text: konege avanu mōsadinda avarannu olisikoṇḍanu mattu avaribbarū ā marada phalavannu savidāga avara guptāṅgagaḷu avara (parasparara) munde prakaṭavāgi biṭṭavu mattu avaribbarū svargada elegaḷinda tam'mannu muccikoḷḷa toḍagidaru. (Āga) avara oḍeyanu avarannu karedu hēḷidanu; nānu nim'mannu ā maradinda taḍediralillavē? Athavā śaitānanu nim'mibbara pāligū spaṣṭa śatruvāgiddānendu nānu nimage hēḷiralillavē
